title: Union Square Greenmarket
location: North & West sides of Union Square Park
short_description: Open all year long, visit the famous Union Square Greenmarket, one of NYC's largest farmers market featuring up to 140 regional farmers, fishers, and bakers, selling seasonal fresh produce.
more_content: Open every Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Saturday, the Union Square Greenmarket hosts weekly cooking demonstrations, special events and seasonal produce to promote healthy living. During its peak season, more than 60,000 market shoppers frequent the marketplace. Please visit GrowNYC's official website for Union Square Greenmarket's schedule.
seo_description: Shop local at New York City's oldest farmers market
